query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Focus Groups on Consumer Perceptions of the Sharing Economy
result.description: A report on consumer perceptions of the challenges and benefits of the sharing economy. In particular, in this report, based on open-ended interview data conducted within the countries represented within the consortium, matters of privacy, power relations and participation are discussed.

result.title: Field test evaluation in Sweden trials: Results and best practice
result.description: - Motorcycle couriers: DynaHUBs will integrate with the scheduled and unscheduled delivery orders of motorcycle couriers in order feed into its core scheduling system. Later, integrating those with delivery orders from other sources, DynaHUBs will live update the courier delivery schedules. We will also mitigate the possible lack of systems to integrate at couriers. We anticipate some couriers not having scheduling systems, rather running at the operator level. - Groceries: We will seek to integrate (at least at the test level) the time-scheduled delivery orders in Groceries. - E-commerce vendors: Similar to Groceries, we will also integrate with e-commerce vendors. We may start with e-commerce vendors given their flexibility in delivery time-windows.

project.title: DynaHUBs is a new application designed to kick start the development of the Physical Internet using a crowd-sourced approach

result.title: List of existing EU recruitment platforms and their capabilities
result.description: The consortium members will perform a thorough analysis of the existing tools/platforms in the partner hubs and generally speaking in the European start-up hubs ecosystem. Each hub will share with the other members a list of the national platforms and the methodologies, the recruitment tools and the best practices.

result.title: Dissemination strategy and plan
result.description: The dissemination of the project’s results will rely on a dissemination plan defining the strategy, the actions and the tools necessary to reach a broad audience, allowing to involve key stakeholders of the European start-up ecosystem and to gain leverage by linking the project with other initiatives, projects and high-tech start-up communities. The plan will include the information to be distributed according to the targeted audience, the frequency, the geographical region, the tools … A presentation of the project and the consortium’s members, their role and resources as well as a calendar, progressively updated, with the main events will be prepared and integrated in the dissemination tool kit.

result.title: Benchmarking of European private investors networks
result.description: A complete benchmarking of different financial networks at the European level will be established by the members of the consortium. We will analyze and share information about a large panel of key investors in each country, by using different resources such as the existing maps established within the scope of European projects like the “startupeuropeclub”.
